00017 // Standard includes
00018 #include "SendHugeData.h"
00019
00020 using namespace Omiscid;
00021
00022 // Static data for SendHugeData
00023 Event SendHugeData::TestDone;
00024 const int SendHugeData::NumberOfInts = 1500000;
00025 const int SendHugeData::BufferSize = sizeof(int) * NumberOfInts;
00026 const int SendHugeData::TotalSize = BufferSize + sizeof(int);
00028     /* @brief constructor */
00029 SendHugeData::SendHugeData()
00030 {
00031     // Ask to the service factory to create a Service. The service is not
00032     // register yet.
00033     MyAssociatedService = ServiceFactory.Create( "SendHugeData" );
00034     if ( MyAssociatedService == (Service *)NULL )
00035     {
00036         OmiscidError( "Could not create the SendHugeData service.\n" );
00037         return;
00038     }
00039
00040     // Add 2 Connectors to receive and send messages (AnOutput and AnInput) and set myself as callback
00041     // object to receive notification of messages
00042     MyAssociatedService->AddConnector( "ReceiveData", "Input for data", AnInput );
00043     MyAssociatedService->AddConnectorListener( "ReceiveData", this );
00044     MyAssociatedService->AddConnector( "SendData", "Output for data", AnOutput );
00045
00046     // register the service and launch everything
00047     MyAssociatedService->Start();
00048
00049     // Trace
00050     OmiscidError( "SendHugeData service started.\n" );
00051 }
00052
00053
00054     /* @brief destructor */
00055 SendHugeData::~SendHugeData()
00056 {
00057     if ( MyAssociatedService != (Service *)NULL )
00058     {
00059         delete MyAssociatedService;
00060     }
00061 }
00062
00063     /* @brief Do mutual connections */
00064 bool SendHugeData::SearchAndConnectToAnotherOne()
00065 {
00066     // Store pointer to the filter object
00067     ServiceFilter * MySearch = And(NameIs("SendHugeData"),Not(PeerIdIs(MyAssociatedService->GetPeerId())));
00068
00069     // Search for a SendHugeData service that is not me
00070     ServiceProxy * TheOtherSendHugeData = MyAssociatedService->FindService( MySearch );
00071
00072     // Free the ServiceFilter. As it is a simple one, call to Empty is not mandatory
00073     MySearch->Empty();
00074     delete MySearch;
00075
00076     if ( TheOtherSendHugeData == (ServiceProxy *)NULL )
00077     {
00078         OmiscidError( "Could not find another SendHugeData service.\n" );
00079         return false;
00080     }
00081
00082     MyAssociatedService->ConnectTo( "SendData", TheOtherSendHugeData, "ReceiveData" );
00083
00084     return true;
00085 }
00086
00087 /* @brief Start mutual exchange. This method is called only on one instance */
00088 void SendHugeData::StartExchange()
00089 {
00090     // Allocate buffer to send
00091     TemporaryMemoryBuffer BufferToSend( TotalSize );
00092
00093     // Get an int pointer to the buffer
00094     int * pUI = (int*)((char*)BufferToSend);
00095
00096     // Fill it, first with the header, an number to incr each time it is received
00097     pUI[0] = 1;
00098     for( int i = 0; i < NumberOfInts; i++ )
00099     {
00100         pUI[i+1] = i;
00101     }
00102
00103     // Buffer is full, send it to TheOtherSendHugeData
00104     TimeToExchangeData.Reset();
00105
00106     // Send data to all clients, so only one !
00107     MyAssociatedService->SendToAllClients( "SendData", (char*)BufferToSend, TotalSize );
00108
00109     DevOmiscidTrace("Data Sent");
00110 }
00111
00112     /* @brief callback function to receive data */
00113 void SendHugeData::MessageReceived(Service& TheService, const SimpleString LocalConnectorName, const Message& Msg)
00114 {
00115     // Ok, we receive data, check what to do with it
00116     // Get an int pointer to the buffer
00117     int * pUI = (int*)Msg.GetBuffer();
00118
00119     OmiscidTrace( "Service %.8x receive buffer n° %d\n", TheService.GetPeerId(), pUI[0] );
00120
00121     if ( pUI[0] >= 10 )
00122     {
00123         // Ok, we have send the data
00124         float TotalTime = (float)TimeToExchangeData.Get()/1000.0f;
00125
00126         float tmpf = (float)(pUI[0]*TotalSize)/TotalTime;
00127         tmpf /= (1024*1024);
00128
00129         OmiscidTrace( "Bitrate during exchange = %2.2f MB/s\n", tmpf );
00130
00131         // Check data
00132         for( int i = 0; i < NumberOfInts; i++ )
00133         {
00134             if ( pUI[i+1] != i )
00135             {
00136                 fprintf( stderr, "Data were corrupted during exchange !!!\n" );
00137                 break;
00138             }
00139         }
00140
00141         TestDone.Signal();
00142     }
00143     else
00144     {
00145         // incr counter and send back data to all client, so one client !
00146         pUI[0]++;
00147         TheService.SendToAllClients( "SendData", Msg.GetBuffer(), Msg.GetLength() );
00148     }
00149 }

00151 #ifdef OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00152 /* @brief main program entry for the Accumulator. No need to give parameter */
00153 int Omiscid::DoSendHugeDataTest( int argc, char*argv[] )
00154 #else
00155 int main( int argc, char*argv[] )
00156 #endif
00157 {
00158     // Create Service
00159     SendHugeData TwoSendHugeData[2];
00160
00161     // Interconnect them
00162     if ( TwoSendHugeData[0].SearchAndConnectToAnotherOne() == false ||
00163          TwoSendHugeData[1].SearchAndConnectToAnotherOne() == false )
00164     {
00165 #ifndef OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00166         // printf use for autotest, except when using GlobalTest procedure
00167         printf( "Test failed.\n" );
00168         fflush( stdout );
00169 #endif
00170         // Could not connect
00171         return -1;
00172     }
00173
00174     // Ask the first one to send the first data. After n exchange, this one will
00175     // stop the exchange and compute bit rate
00176     TwoSendHugeData[0].StartExchange();
00177
00178     // Wait for exchange to be done
00179     SendHugeData::TestDone.Wait();
00180
00181 #ifndef OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
00182     // printf use for autotest, except when using GlobalTest procedure
00183     printf( "Test ok.\n" );
00184     fflush( stdout );
00185 #endif
00186 
00187     return 0;
00188 }
